answers.answer: Hello!Check for any local injuries or issues like Diabetes and anemia etc.Apply ice packs and take intermittent NSAIDs to decrease symptoms.If the symptoms continue get yourself examined by an orthopedician and go for proper treatment.Take care!

question: the heel on my left foot has been hurting me for over a year now,and now it is starting to go up to my ankle. any idea what is causing this
title: heel pain
